description:
8.90 flanger
Apply a flanging effect to the audio.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: flanger

parameters.description: Set base delay in milliseconds. Range from 0 to 30. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: delay

parameters.description: Set added sweep delay in milliseconds. Range from 0 to 10. Default value is 2.
parameters.name: depth

parameters.description: Set percentage regeneration (delayed signal feedback). Range from -95 to 95. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: regen

parameters.description: Set percentage of delayed signal mixed with original. Range from 0 to 100. Default value is 71.
parameters.name: width

parameters.description: Set sweeps per second (Hz). Range from 0.1 to 10. Default value is 0.5.
parameters.name: speed

parameters.description: Set swept wave shape, can be triangular or sinusoidal. Default value is sinusoidal.
parameters.name: shape

parameters.description: Set swept wave percentage-shift for multi channel. Range from 0 to 100. Default value is 25.
parameters.name: phase

source:
8.90 flanger

Apply a flanging effect to the audio.

The filter accepts the following options:

delay

Set base delay in milliseconds. Range from 0 to 30. Default value is 0.

depth

Set added sweep delay in milliseconds. Range from 0 to 10. Default value is 2.

regen

Set percentage regeneration (delayed signal feedback). Range from -95 to 95. Default value is 0.

width

Set percentage of delayed signal mixed with original. Range from 0 to 100. Default value is 71.

speed

Set sweeps per second (Hz). Range from 0.1 to 10. Default value is 0.5.

shape

Set swept wave shape, can be triangular or sinusoidal. Default value is sinusoidal.

phase

Set swept wave percentage-shift for multi channel. Range from 0 to 100. Default value is 25.

interp

Set delay-line interpolation, linear or quadratic. Default is linear.
